subject: messages at the beginning
author: iankerry@rocketmail.com
full_text:
i have been experimenting in evp for about a year now and i now consider it to be 'repeatable objective evidence for the afterlife, absolutely.most of my captures are loud and clear but one thing bugs me, is that most of messages are recorded immediatly, the instant i press the record button.anyone else experienced this ?


Here is an example


http://www.box.net/shared/na2av2cbyz
